member.name: M:MauiApp1.Areas.Chat.Views.PromotionContentView.RefreshPromotionMessages
member.summary: Method RefreshPromotionMessages - Clears the private field _promotionViewModel. - Call API of GetPromotionChat. - Populate private field of _promotionViewModel using foreach.

member.name: M:MauiApp1.Areas.Chat.Views.PromotionContentView.GetImageDimension(System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Method GetImageDimension - Returns the image size from image url.

member.summary: Animates the TextColor of an to the given color
member.param: The target color to animate the to
The time, in milliseconds, between the frames of the animation
The duration, in milliseconds, of the animation
The easing function to be used in the animation
member.returns: Value indicating if the animation completed successfully or not
